= Release history =

The release history of the Java Information Dynamics Toolkit is described here:

 * v0.1.2 ([http://code.google.com/p/information-dynamics-toolkit/downloads/detail?name=infodynamics-dist-0.1.2.zip full], [http://code.google.com/p/information-dynamics-toolkit/downloads/detail?name=infodynamics-jar-0.1.2.zip jar]) - 19/11/2012 - [http://code.google.com/p/information-dynamics-toolkit/source/detail?r=116 svn 116] - updated to include demo code for "Moving frames of reference ..." and "Measuring information-transfer delays" paper
 * v0.1.1 ([http://code.google.com/p/information-dynamics-toolkit/downloads/detail?name=infodynamics-dist-0.1.1.zip full], [http://code.google.com/p/information-dynamics-toolkit/downloads/detail?name=infodynamics-jar-0.1.1.zip jar]) - 30/10/2012 - [http://code.google.com/p/information-dynamics-toolkit/source/detail?r=104 svn 104] - first full distribution with ant file, javadocs, jar, junit tests.
 * v0.1 ([http://code.google.com/p/information-dynamics-toolkit/downloads/detail?name=infodynamics-jar-0.1.zip jar]) - 24/10/2012 - first jar distribution
